name: Simple RGB
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

Use [A]/ [D] to switch around red, green, blue .

Use [W]/ [S] to increase or decrease the value of the color.

Click [Enter] button to compare.

Goal: You have to adjust the RGB values to match the color of the given image.

Rule: When the color's value you are adjusting is lower than the color's value of the image, a '<' sign will appear. Otherwise, a '>' sign will appear. If the color's value is correct, the '=' sign will appear.
